channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Jelly Roll Perform Power Ballad About His Online Haters
item.description: 🎤 Jelly Roll claps back at online haters with a powerful ballad! 🙌 Who else is feeling this fierce vibe? 🔥 #JellyRoll #MusicNews

item.title: John Mayer Celebrates Grateful Dead’s 60 Years With Emotional Post: ‘Great Honor’
item.description: 🌟 Cheers to John Mayer for honoring Grateful Dead's 60 years! 🎸 Let the music love continue! 💙 #MusicLegends #JohnMayer #GratefulDead

item.title: Freddie Gibbs and the Alchemist Announce North American Tour
item.description: Buckle up, y'all! 🚀 Freddie Gibbs and The Alchemist hitting the road for a North American tour! 🎶 Who's ready to vibe? 🙌 #FreddieGibbs #TheAlchemist #TourAnnouncement

item.title: Green Day get their own Garbage Pail Kids cards
item.description: Green Day rocking their own Garbage Pail Kids cards? 🤘🃏 These punks are taking collectibles to a whole new level! #GreenDay #MusicNews

item.title: Justin Bieber Clears His Mind With a Family Vacation in ‘Yukon’ Video
item.description: Justin Bieber’s chillin’ in 'Yukon' 🏔️ Watch him unwind and vibe with fam in this feel-good video! #JustinBieber #YukonVibes 🎶
